details:
noun
- spicy red berrylike fruit
= example: spicy red berrylike fruit
= synonyms: boxberry, checkerberry, teaberry, spiceberry
- creeping shrub of eastern North America having white bell-shaped flowers followed by spicy red berrylike fruit and shiny aromatic leaves that yield wintergreen oil
= synonyms: checkerberry, teaberry, mountain tea, groundberry, ground-berry, creeping wintergreen
- any of several evergreen perennials of the genus Pyrola
= synonyms: pyrola
